channel.title: A fatal exception has been thrown ? Random Server Crashing
channel.description:
Hey guys every so offten my server randomly crashes and says error you cant connect this is the run.cmd log when it crashed
Please have a look at picture attached thanks
Pk Evolution ~ By Owner Sam ------------------------------------------------------------- [code] [5/22/13 6:32 PM]: [player-5]: Fatal: Internal error: unable to determine connec tion vertex! wp1=(51, 52), wp2=(52, 51), first=(50, 50) [5/22/13 6:32 PM]: [player-5]: Invalid waypoint in walking queue! [5/22/13 6:32 PM]: Saved all games. [5/22/13 6:33 PM]: Saved all games. [5/22/13 6:33 PM]: Saved all games. [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: Saved all games. [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: Average Cycle Time: 45ms [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: Players online: 10, engine load: 7.83% [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: [LoggedIn]: dharok [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: Saved all games. [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1 [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: at server.world.WalkingHandler$TiledMap.getFlag(WalkingH andler.java:67) [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: at server.world.WalkingHandler.traversable(WalkingHandle r.java:27) [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: at server.model.npcs.NPC.getNextWalkingDirection(NPC.jav a:224) [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: at server.model.npcs.NPC.getNextNPCMovement(NPC.java:235 ) [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.followPlayer(NPCHandler. java:3044) [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java: 2065) [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:185) [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: A fatal exception has been thrown! [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: Saved game for tristan. [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: Saved game for dharok. [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: Saved game for sheldon604. [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: Saved game for paper rocket. [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: Saved game for mr king1. [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: Saved game for caleb. [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: Saved game for hoffy. [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: Saved game for markbrown. [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: Saved game for except cb. [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: Saved game for owner sam. [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: Saved game for king rob. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: A fatal exception has been thrown ? Random Server Crashing
item.dc:creator: @pk_evolution pk evolution
item.description:
@pk_evolution wrote:

Hey guys every so offten my server randomly crashes and says error you cant connect this is the run.cmd log when it crashed

Please have a look at picture attached thanks

Pk Evolution ~ By Owner Sam

[5/22/13 6:32 PM]: [player-5]: Fatal: Internal error: unable to determine connec tion vertex! wp1=(51, 52), wp2=(52, 51), first=(50, 50) [5/22/13 6:32 PM]: [player-5]: Invalid waypoint in walking queue! [5/22/13 6:32 PM]: Saved all games. [5/22/13 6:33 PM]: Saved all games. [5/22/13 6:33 PM]: Saved all games. [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: Saved all games. [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: Average Cycle Time: 45ms [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: Players online: 10, engine load: 7.83% [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: [LoggedIn]: dharok [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: Saved all games. [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1 [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: at server.world.WalkingHandler$TiledMap.getFlag(WalkingH andler.java:67) [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: at server.world.WalkingHandler.traversable(WalkingHandle r.java:27) [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: at server.model.npcs.NPC.getNextWalkingDirection(NPC.jav a:224) [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: at server.model.npcs.NPC.getNextNPCMovement(NPC.java:235 ) [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.followPlayer(NPCHandler. java:3044) [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java: 2065) [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:185) [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: A fatal exception has been thrown! [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: Saved game for tristan. [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: Saved game for dharok. [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: Saved game for sheldon604. [5/22/13 6:34 PM]: Saved game for paper rocket.
